title: 急！！跨服聊天BungeeCordChat报错
author: HelloMCS
txt_content:
服务器后台报错如下
[22:51:40] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event PlayerLoginEvent to Chat v0.5b-57
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/massivecraft/factions/Rel
        at com.minecraftdimensions.bungeesuitechat.listeners.LoginListener.setFormatChat(LoginListener.java:35) ~[?:?]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.LoginListener.e(LoginListener.java:68) ~[Paper-1.12.2-b1613.jar:git-Paper-1613]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.NetworkManager.a(NetworkManager.java:273) ~[Paper-1.12.2-b1613.jar:git-Paper-1613]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.ServerConnection.c(ServerConnection.java:150) ~[Paper-1.12.2-b1613.jar:git-Paper-1613]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:948) ~[Paper-1.12.2-b1613.jar:git-Paper-1613]

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.massivecraft.factions.Rel
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:382) ~[?:1.8.0_191]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.PluginClassLoader.findClass(PluginClassLoader.java:156) ~[Paper-1.12.2-b1613.jar:git-Paper-1613]

        ... 16 more复制代码然后如果我在游戏里面发信息，游戏里面什么提示都没有但是后台会报如下错误
Player did not connect properly through BungeeCord, Chat canceled!复制代码请问大神这是什么原因呀
服务器版本是1.12.2paper版本
比较着急，麻烦大神们了。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
HelloMCS 发表于 2019-6-22 23:15
BC上装了Bungeesuit和Bugeecord了，并且已经配好mysql
不如试试这两个插件吧，我觉得是插件的问题

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-631240-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-704339-1-1.html
